rules.content: Sacrifice Rainbow, the Living Canvas: Counter target creature spell.
Other creatures you control with the type Painter have "Exile this creature: Counter target spell."
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return a target card of type Painter from exile to the battlefield under your control.
Where the storm ends and color begins, all other magic is unmade.

tags.setting: A majestic rainbow-winged entity hovers above a floating artist's studio in the clouds, while painter creatures below channel colorful magic into swirling spell-shields that dissolve incoming threats.
